!Sentry Kristin: Have you come back after teaching a lesson to that lowly race that has forgotten its place? The shackles you have returned with will be useful for *Tetrarch Vellior's* spell research. As promised, I will reward you for each shackle you have brought me. If you are not tired of the hunt yet, could you continue a little more? I don't know whether the spell research is going well ... But the Tetrarch says that he needs more shackles.
